constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 99 (Thursday, June 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FERGUSON:
H.R. 8006.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 (Necessary and Proper
Clause)
[Page H5447]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Student Loan Accountability Act
